text: Modern Welcoming church with services in various languages to serve the local community. Great to see a large energetic youth congregation while engaging the elders and those with special needs. Live band music and singing. Do check on the church website for the different language services.

I like the Christmas Sunday service. My sister and her family were at the Sunday service, Charmaine is having membership transfer ceremony, so she invited me to witness. The atmosphere is holy and godly. Very impressed and proud.

It's a place of worship for all Bible believing Christians. Located in a HDB neighborhood.
Carpark facilities nearby.
Easy to get there by bus or a slow leisurely 15-minute walk. There's services for English speaking, Mandarin speaking, Hokkien speaking, Tamil speaking and Tagalog speaking.
Beautiful church with an amazing community of people. A place to discover the truths and the word of God. My wife and I are glad to have joined the church.

Family warm and loving church.
Not rowdy, noisy worship songs.
Heart touching so gs and message
